flawed_nl_solution:
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200>>200
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 200 = <<1000+200=1200>>1200
He takes out $600 because 1200 / 2 = <<1200/2=600>>600
After this it has $600 in it because 1200 - 600 = <<1200-600=600>>600
She earns $90 in interest because 600 x 0.15 = <<600*0.15=90>>90
The account now has $960 because 600 + 90 = <<600+90=960>>960
#### 960

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 690, not 960. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
